body.p: During the year ending 31 December 20X3, M determines that there is no impairment of any of its cash‑generating units or group of cash‑generating units containing goodwill or intangible assets with indefinite useful lives . The recoverable amounts (ie higher of value in use and fair value less costs of disposal) of those units and group of units are determined on the basis of value in use calculations. M has determined that the recoverable amount calculations are most sensitive to changes in the following assumptions:
